posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: September 16, 2015 at 8:29 PM#4Assuming your colors is not reduced in brightness, then scaling the CMY representation of your colors should more or less work as saturating/desaturating.make sure that your default (=commandline-access) color-representation is  CMY:CodeAssign UserProfile $"userprofile"."usersettings" /defaultmixcolorreadout=cmysaturate:CodeAttribute "COLORRGB*" At *1.1desaturate:CodeAttribute "COLORRGB*" At *0.9
